feed.title: Generalized covenants with taproot enable riskless or risky lending, prevent credit inflation through fractional reserve

entry.title: Generalized covenants with taproot enable riskless or risky lending, prevent credit inflation through fractional reserve
entry.summary: The author has published a resource on the concept of the risk-free return fallacy via GitHub. The link provided leads to a wiki page that elaborates on this concept. The author has also mentioned that they will not be making any further comments unless there are new inputs.
